name: Poster Rotator
description: Fill a local poster pool per movie from providers, then periodically rotate the Primary Poster image from the pool. This keeps Jellyfin looking fresh with rotating poster images on an interval of your choosing.

versions.changelog: Image quality filtering (min dimensions), retry with exponential backoff, perceptual duplicate detection (optional), pool purge button. Pool Manager removed.
New Pool Manager web interface, provider image search, language preferences (VO support), manual upload, orphan cleanup, and modern UI improvements.
